item.text: Proof-of-stake is a method of securing a network and achieving distributed consensus through requesting users to show ownership of a certain amount of tokens representing their part of the system. Currently used to describe securing a cryptocurrency network.
item.title: Proof of Stake

item.text: Proof of Stake is used to describe a method of securing a cryptocurrency network. However, it can be applied to other cases in which block chain technology is used.
For example: reputation systems. If reputation is expressed in tokens through agreed set of rules by which these tokens are issued, Proof-of-Stake can be used for voting.
